snippet: The voting process for the National Basketball Association's All-Star Game has been expanded to include current players and members of the media, the NBA announced on Monday....
lead_paragraph: The voting process for the National Basketball Association's All-Star Game has been expanded to include current players and members of the media, the NBA announced on Monday.

headline.main: Players, Media Added to All-Star Game Voting Process
headline.print_headline: Players, Media Added to All-Star Game Voting Process
